movies.title: House of Sand and Fog
movies.actors: Jennifer Connelly, Ben Kingsley, Ron Eldard
movies.plot: An abandoned wife is evicted from her house and starts a tragic conflict with her house's new owners.

movies.title: Fatal Attraction
movies.actors: Michael Douglas, Glenn Close, Anne Archer
movies.plot: A married man's one-night stand comes back to haunt him when that lover begins to stalk him and his family.

movies.title: Overboard
movies.actors: Goldie Hawn, Kurt Russell, Edward Herrmann
movies.plot: A cruel but beautiful heiress mocks and cheats a hired carpenter. When she gets amnesia after an accident, he decides to introduce her to regular life by convincing her that they're husband and wife.

movies.title: 5 to 7
movies.actors: Anton Yelchin, Bérénice Marlohe, Olivia Thirlby
movies.plot: An aspiring novelist enters into a relationship with a woman, though there's just one catch: She's married and the couple can only meet between the hours of 5 and 7 each evening.

movies.title: Devs
movies.actors: Sonoya Mizuno, Nick Offerman, Jin Ha
movies.plot: A computer engineer investigates the secretive development division in her company, which she believes is behind the disappearance of her boyfriend.

movies.title: Another Round
movies.actors: Mads Mikkelsen, Thomas Bo Larsen, Magnus Millang
movies.plot: Four high-school teachers consume alcohol on a daily basis to see how it affects their social and professional lives.

movies.title: Falling Down
movies.actors: Michael Douglas, Robert Duvall, Barbara Hershey
movies.plot: An ordinary man frustrated with the various flaws he sees in society begins to psychotically and violently lash out against them.

movies.title: The Talented Mr. Ripley
movies.actors: Matt Damon, Gwyneth Paltrow, Jude Law
movies.plot: In late 1950s New York, a young underachiever named Tom Ripley is sent to Italy to retrieve Dickie Greenleaf, a rich and spoiled millionaire playboy. But when the errand fails, Ripley takes extreme measures.

movies.title: The Loft
movies.actors: Karl Urban, James Marsden, Wentworth Miller
movies.plot: Five married guys secretly share a penthouse loft in the city where they can carry out hidden affairs. But the fantasy becomes a nightmare, when they discover the dead body of a woman in the loft one of the group must be involved.

movies.title: Annihilation
movies.actors: Natalie Portman, Jennifer Jason Leigh, Tessa Thompson
movies.plot: A biologist signs up for a dangerous, secret expedition into a mysterious zone where the laws of nature don't apply.

movies.title: Why Women Kill
movies.actors: Jack Davenport, Lucy Liu, Allison Tolman
movies.plot: An anthology series that follows three women in different decades all living in the same house, as they deal with infidelity and betrayals in their marriages.

movies.title: Upload
movies.actors: Robbie Amell, Andy Allo, Allegra Edwards
movies.plot: A man is able to choose his own afterlife after his untimely death, by having his consciousness uploaded into a virtual world. As he gets used to his new life and befriends his angel (real world handler), questions about his death...

movies.title: Resident Alien
movies.actors: Alan Tudyk, Sara Tomko, Corey Reynolds
movies.plot: A crash-landed alien takes on the identity of a small-town Colorado doctor and slowly begins to wrestle with the moral dilemma of his secret mission on Earth.

movies.title: Unorthodox
movies.actors: Shira Haas, Amit Rahav, Jeff Wilbusch
movies.plot: Story of a young ultra-Orthodox Jewish woman who flees her arranged marriage and religious community to start a new life abroad.

movies.title: Blast from the Past
movies.actors: Brendan Fraser, Alicia Silverstone, Christopher Walken
movies.plot: A naive man comes out into the world after spending 35 years in a nuclear fallout shelter.

movies.title: Bad Times at the El Royale
movies.actors: Jeff Bridges, Cynthia Erivo, Dakota Johnson
movies.plot: Early 1970s. Four strangers check in at the El Royale Hotel. The hotel is deserted, staffed by a single desk clerk. Some of the new guests' reasons for being there are less than innocent and some are not who they appear to be.

movies.title: Love, Death & Robots
movies.actors: Fred Tatasciore, Scott Whyte, Nolan North
movies.plot: A collection of animated short stories that span various genres including science fiction, fantasy, horror and comedy.

movies.title: Moonlight
movies.actors: Mahershala Ali, Naomie Harris, Trevante Rhodes
movies.plot: A young African-American man grapples with his identity and sexuality while experiencing the everyday struggles of childhood, adolescence, and burgeoning adulthood.

movies.title: Airplane!

movies.plot: A man afraid to fly must ensure that a plane lands safely after the pilots become sick.

movies.title: Ferris Bueller's Day Off
movies.actors: Matthew Broderick, Alan Ruck, Mia Sara
movies.plot: A high school wise guy is determined to have a day off from school, despite what the Principal thinks of that.

movies.title: Leviathan

movies.plot: In a Russian coastal town, Kolya is forced to fight the corrupt mayor when he is told that his house will be demolished. He recruits a lawyer friend to help, but the man's arrival brings further misfortune for Kolya and his family.

movies.title: The Geographer Drank His Globe Away

movies.plot: The ordinary troubles of the ordinary teacher in the ordinary class during the ordinary midlife crisis.

movies.title: Room

movies.plot: Held captive for 7 years in an enclosed space, a woman and her young son finally gain their freedom, allowing the boy to experience the outside world for the first time.

movies.title: The Theory of Everything

movies.plot: A look at the relationship between the famous physicist Stephen Hawking and his wife.

movies.title: Whiplash

movies.plot: A promising young drummer enrolls at a cut-throat music conservatory where his dreams of greatness are mentored by an instructor who will stop at nothing to realize a student's potential.

movies.title: The Bridge on the River Kwai

movies.plot: British POWs are forced to build a railway bridge across the river Kwai for their Japanese captors in occupied Burma, not knowing that the allied forces are planning a daring commando raid through the jungle to destroy it.

movies.title: Apocalypse Now

movies.plot: A U.S. Army officer serving in Vietnam is tasked with assassinating a renegade Special Forces Colonel who sees himself as a god.

movies.title: What We Do in the Shadows

movies.plot: Viago, Deacon, and Vladislav are vampires who are struggling with the mundane aspects of modern life, like paying rent, keeping up with the chore wheel, trying to get into nightclubs, and overcoming flatmate conflicts.

movies.title: What We Did on Our Holiday
movies.actors: Rosamund Pike, David Tennant, Billy Connolly
movies.plot: A family of five heads to Granddad's big 75th-birthday party at an uncle's estate in rural Scotland. The parents are separated and hope their three kids won't mention it. The kids love, can talk with, and would do anything for Gra...

movies.title: Parasite

movies.plot: Greed and class discrimination threaten the newly formed symbiotic relationship between the wealthy Park family and the destitute Kim clan.

movies.title: Green Book

movies.plot: A working-class Italian-American bouncer becomes the driver for an African-American classical pianist on a tour of venues through the 1960s American South.

movies.title: Onward

movies.plot: Two elven brothers embark on a quest to bring their father back for one day.

movies.title: Spies in Disguise

movies.plot: When the world's best spy is turned into a pigeon, he must rely on his nerdy tech officer to save the world.

movies.title: The Apartment

movies.plot: A recently engaged man sees a former lover and becomes obsessed with meeting her again.

movies.title: Extreme Job
movies.actors: Lee Dong-yong, Kim Eui-sung, Myoung Gong
movies.plot: A police undercover operation takes a delicious, unexpected turn.

movies.title: Cruella
movies.actors: Emma Stone, Emma Thompson, Joel Fry
movies.plot: A live-action prequel feature film following a young Cruella de Vil.

movies.title: In Bruges

movies.plot: Guilt-stricken after a job gone wrong, hitman Ray and his partner await orders from their ruthless boss in Bruges, Belgium, the last place in the world Ray wants to be.

movies.title: The Mauritanian
movies.actors: Tahar Rahim, Nouhe Hamady Bari, Saadna Hamoud
movies.plot: Mohamedou Ould Slahi fights for freedom after being detained and imprisoned without charge by the U.S. Government for years.

movies.title: Knives Out

movies.title: Squid Game

movies.plot: Hundreds of cash-strapped players accept a strange invitation to compete in children's games. Inside, a tempting prize awaits with deadly high stakes. A survival game that has a whopping 45.6 billion-won prize at stake.

movies.title: I'm Your Man
movies.actors: Maren Eggert, Dan Stevens, Sandra Hüller
movies.plot: In order to obtain research funds for her studies, a scientist accepts an offer to participate in an extraordinary experiment: for three weeks, she is to live with a humanoid robot, created to make her happy.

movies.title: Boss Level

movies.title: What About Bob?

movies.plot: A successful psychotherapist loses his mind after one of his most dependent patients, an obsessive-compulsive neurotic, tracks him down during his family vacation.

movies.title: Fantastic Mr. Fox

movies.plot: An urbane fox cannot resist returning to his farm raiding ways and then must help his community survive the farmers' retaliation.

movies.title: The Lost City

movies.plot: Little Red Riding Hood, the Wolf, the Woodsman, and Granny all tell the police the events that led up to their encounter.

movies.plot: An insurance investigator and an efficency expert who hate each other are both hypnotized by a crooked hypnotist with a jade scorpion into stealing jewels.

movies.plot: A middle-aged Chinese immigrant is swept up in an insane adventure in which she alone can save existence by exploring other universes connecting with the lives she could have led.

movies.title: Barney's Version

movies.plot: The picaresque and touching story of the politically incorrect, fully lived life of the impulsive, irascible and fearlessly blunt Barney Panofsky.

movies.title: Sing 2

movies.title: Big Fish

movies.plot: A lonely scholar, on a trip to Istanbul, discovers a Djinn who offers her three wishes in exchange for his freedom.

movies.plot: Based on true events, a Spanish man with multiple sclerosis who tried to finish an Iron-Man competition despite he was told that he could not make 100 meters.

movies.plot: As adults, best friends Julien and Sophie continue the odd game they started as children -- a fearless competition to outdo one another with daring and outrageous stunts. While they often act out to relieve one another's pain, the...

movies.title: Troy

movies.plot: An adaptation of Homer's great epic, the film follows the assault on Troy by the united Greek forces and chronicles the fates of the men involved.

movies.title: The Cotton Club

movies.plot: Meet the jazz musicians, dancers, owner, and guests (like gangster Dutch Schultz) of The Cotton Club in 1928-1930s Harlem.

movies.plot: A tale of friendship between two unlikely pen pals: Mary, a lonely, eight-year-old girl living in the suburbs of Melbourne, and Max, a forty-four-year old, severely obese man living in New York.

movies.title: Taxi Driver

movies.plot: On vacation in Thailand, Richard sets out for an island rumored to be a solitary beach paradise.

movies.title: Ratatouille

movies.plot: After he becomes a quadriplegic from a paragliding accident, an aristocrat hires a young man from the projects to be his caregiver.

movies.plot: In a countryside town bordering on a magical land, a young man makes a promise to his beloved that he'll retrieve a fallen star by venturing into the magical realm.

movies.title: Looper

movies.plot: In 2074, when the mob wants to get rid of someone, the target is sent into the past, where a hired gun awaits - someone like Joe - who one day learns the mob wants to 'close the loop' by sending back Joe's future self for assassin...

movies.plot: When a shy groom practices his wedding vows in the inadvertent presence of a deceased young woman, she rises from the grave assuming he has married her.

movies.title: Sid and Nancy

movies.plot: The relationship between Sid Vicious, bassist for British punk group Sex Pistols, and his girlfriend Nancy Spungen is portrayed.

movies.title: Alice in Wonderland

movies.plot: Holden and Banky are comic book artists. Everything's going good for them until they meet Alyssa, also a comic book artist. Holden falls for her, but his hopes are crushed when he finds out she's a lesbian.

movies.plot: Eddy persuades his three pals to pool money for a vital poker game against a powerful local mobster, Hatchet Harry. Eddy loses, after which Harry gives him a week to pay back 500,000 pounds.

movies.title: Lucky Number Slevin

movies.plot: A case of mistaken identity lands Slevin into the middle of a war being plotted by two of the city's most rival crime bosses. Under constant surveillance by Detective Brikowski and assassin Goodkat, he must get them before they ge...

movies.title: Les Misérables

movies.plot: In 19th-century France, Jean Valjean, who for decades has been hunted by the ruthless policeman Javert after breaking parole, agrees to care for a factory worker's daughter. The decision changes their lives forever.

movies.title: Shutter Island

movies.title: The Great Gatsby

movies.plot: A writer and wall street trader, Nick, finds himself drawn to the past and lifestyle of his millionaire neighbor, Jay Gatsby.

movies.title: Reservoir Dogs

movies.plot: When a simple jewelry heist goes horribly wrong, the surviving criminals begin to suspect that one of them is a police informant.

movies.title: Pan's Labyrinth

movies.title: The Great Beauty

movies.plot: Jep Gambardella has seduced his way through the lavish nightlife of Rome for decades, but after his 65th birthday and a shock from the past, Jep looks past the nightclubs and parties to find a timeless landscape of absurd, exquisi...

movies.title: Requiem for a Dream

movies.plot: The drug-induced utopias of four Coney Island people are shattered when their addictions run deep.

movies.title: The Truman Show
movies.actors: Jim Carrey, Ed Harris, Laura Linney
movies.plot: An insurance salesman discovers his whole life is actually a reality TV show.

movies.title: The Hobbit: The Desolation of Smaug
movies.actors: Ian McKellen, Martin Freeman, Richard Armitage
movies.plot: The dwarves, along with Bilbo Baggins and Gandalf the Grey, continue their quest to reclaim Erebor, their homeland, from Smaug. Bilbo Baggins is in possession of a mysterious and magical ring.

movies.title: The Hobbit: An Unexpected Journey
movies.actors: Martin Freeman, Ian McKellen, Richard Armitage
movies.plot: A reluctant Hobbit, Bilbo Baggins, sets out to the Lonely Mountain with a spirited group of dwarves to reclaim their mountain home, and the gold within it from the dragon Smaug.

movies.title: The Artist
movies.actors: Jean Dujardin, Bérénice Bejo, John Goodman
movies.plot: An egomaniacal film star develops a relationship with a young dancer against the backdrop of Hollywood's silent era.

movies.title: Slumdog Millionaire
movies.actors: Dev Patel, Freida Pinto, Saurabh Shukla
movies.plot: A Mumbai teenager reflects on his life after being accused of cheating on the Indian version of "Who Wants to be a Millionaire?".

movies.title: Forrest Gump
movies.actors: Tom Hanks, Robin Wright, Gary Sinise
movies.plot: The presidencies of Kennedy and Johnson, the Vietnam War, the Watergate scandal and other historical events unfold from the perspective of an Alabama man with an IQ of 75, whose only desire is to be reunited with his childhood swe...

movies.title: Vicky Cristina Barcelona
movies.actors: Rebecca Hall, Scarlett Johansson, Javier Bardem
movies.plot: Two friends on a summer holiday in Spain become enamored with the same painter, unaware that his ex-wife, with whom he has a tempestuous relationship, is about to re-enter the picture.

movies.title: Lost in Translation
movies.actors: Bill Murray, Scarlett Johansson, Giovanni Ribisi
movies.plot: A faded movie star and a neglected young woman form an unlikely bond after crossing paths in Tokyo.

movies.title: Match Point
movies.actors: Scarlett Johansson, Jonathan Rhys Meyers, Emily Mortimer
movies.plot: At a turning point in his life, a former tennis pro falls for an actress who happens to be dating his friend and soon-to-be brother-in-law.

movies.title: North by Northwest
movies.actors: Cary Grant, Eva Marie Saint, James Mason
movies.plot: A New York City advertising executive goes on the run after being mistaken for a government agent by a group of foreign spies, and falls for a woman whose loyalties he begins to doubt.

movies.title: Psycho
movies.actors: Anthony Perkins, Janet Leigh, Vera Miles
movies.plot: A Phoenix secretary embezzles $40,000 from her employer's client, goes on the run and checks into a remote motel run by a young man under the domination of his mother.

movies.title: Madagascar
movies.actors: Chris Rock, Ben Stiller, David Schwimmer
movies.plot: A group of animals who have spent all their life in a New York zoo end up in the jungles of Madagascar, and must adjust to living in the wild.

movies.title: Madagascar 3: Europe's Most Wanted
movies.director: Eric Darnell, Tom McGrath, Conrad Vernon
movies.actors: Ben Stiller, Jada Pinkett Smith, Chris Rock
movies.plot: The Madagascar animals join a struggling European circus to get back to New York, but find themselves being pursued by a psychotic animal-control officer.

movies.title: Madagascar: Escape 2 Africa
movies.actors: Ben Stiller, Chris Rock, David Schwimmer
movies.plot: The Madagascar animals fly back to New York City, but crash-land on an African nature reserve, where they meet others of their own kind, and Alex especially discovers his royal heritage as prince of a lion pride.

movies.title: Ice Age
movies.actors: Denis Leary, John Leguizamo, Ray Romano
movies.plot: The story revolves around sub-zero heroes: a woolly mammoth, a saber-toothed tiger, a sloth and a prehistoric combination of a squirrel and rat, known as Scrat.

movies.title: Despicable Me 2
movies.actors: Steve Carell, Kristen Wiig, Benjamin Bratt
movies.plot: When Gru, the world's most super-bad turned super-dad has been recruited by a team of officials to stop lethal muscle and a host of Gru's own, He has to fight back with new gadgetry, cars, and more minion madness.

movies.title: Despicable Me
movies.actors: Steve Carell, Jason Segel, Russell Brand
movies.plot: When a criminal mastermind uses a trio of orphan girls as pawns for a grand scheme, he finds their love is profoundly changing him for the better.

movies.title: God Bless America
movies.actors: Joel Murray, Tara Lynne Barr, Mackenzie Brooke Smith
movies.plot: On a mission to rid society of its most repellent citizens, terminally ill Frank makes an unlikely accomplice in 16-year-old Roxy.

movies.title: The Social Network
movies.actors: Jesse Eisenberg, Andrew Garfield, Justin Timberlake
movies.plot: As Harvard student Mark Zuckerberg creates the social networking site that would become known as Facebook, he is sued by the twins who claimed he stole their idea, and by the co-founder who was later squeezed out of the business.

movies.title: Downfall
movies.actors: Bruno Ganz, Alexandra Maria Lara, Ulrich Matthes
movies.plot: Traudl Junge, the final secretary for Adolf Hitler, tells of the Nazi dictator's final days in his Berlin bunker at the end of WWII.

movies.title: The Pianist
movies.actors: Adrien Brody, Thomas Kretschmann, Frank Finlay
movies.plot: A Polish Jewish musician struggles to survive the destruction of the Warsaw ghetto of World War II.

movies.title: Casino
movies.actors: Robert De Niro, Sharon Stone, Joe Pesci
movies.plot: A tale of greed, deception, money, power, and murder occur between two best friends: a mafia enforcer and a casino executive compete against each other over a gambling empire, and over a fast-living and fast-loving socialite.

movies.title: Catch Me If You Can
movies.actors: Leonardo DiCaprio, Tom Hanks, Christopher Walken
movies.plot: Barely 21 yet, Frank is a skilled forger who has passed as a doctor, lawyer and pilot. FBI agent Carl becomes obsessed with tracking down the con man, who only revels in the pursuit.

movies.title: Alive
movies.actors: Ethan Hawke, Vincent Spano, Josh Hamilton
movies.plot: After crash-landing in the snowswept Andes, a Uruguayan rugby team have no choice but to turn to desperate measures in order to survive.

movies.title: Casablanca
movies.actors: Humphrey Bogart, Ingrid Bergman, Paul Henreid
movies.plot: A cynical expatriate American cafe owner struggles to decide whether or not to help his former lover and her fugitive husband escape the Nazis in French Morocco.

movies.title: Crash
movies.actors: Don Cheadle, Sandra Bullock, Thandiwe Newton
movies.plot: Los Angeles citizens with vastly separate lives collide in interweaving stories of race, loss and redemption.

movies.title: American History X
movies.actors: Edward Norton, Edward Furlong, Beverly D'Angelo
movies.plot: A former neo-nazi skinhead tries to prevent his younger brother from going down the same wrong path that he did.

movies.title: American Gangster
movies.actors: Denzel Washington, Russell Crowe, Chiwetel Ejiofor
movies.plot: An outcast New York City cop is charged with bringing down Harlem drug lord Frank Lucas, whose real life inspired this partly biographical film.

movies.title: Pirates of the Caribbean: On Stranger Tides
movies.actors: Johnny Depp, Penélope Cruz, Ian McShane
movies.plot: Jack Sparrow and Barbossa embark on a quest to find the elusive fountain of youth, only to discover that Blackbeard and his daughter are after it too.

movies.title: Pirates of the Caribbean: The Curse of the Black Pearl
movies.actors: Johnny Depp, Geoffrey Rush, Orlando Bloom
movies.plot: Blacksmith Will Turner teams up with eccentric pirate "Captain" Jack Sparrow to save his love, the governor's daughter, from Jack's former pirate allies, who are now undead.

movies.title: Pirates of the Caribbean: At World's End
movies.actors: Johnny Depp, Orlando Bloom, Keira Knightley
movies.plot: Captain Barbossa, Will Turner and Elizabeth Swann must sail off the edge of the map, navigate treachery and betrayal, find Jack Sparrow, and make their final alliances for one last decisive battle.

movies.title: The Lord of the Rings: The Two Towers
movies.actors: Elijah Wood, Ian McKellen, Viggo Mortensen
movies.plot: While Frodo and Sam edge closer to Mordor with the help of the shifty Gollum, the divided fellowship makes a stand against Sauron's new ally, Saruman, and his hordes of Isengard.

movies.title: The Lord of the Rings: The Return of the King
movies.actors: Elijah Wood, Viggo Mortensen, Ian McKellen
movies.plot: Gandalf and Aragorn lead the World of Men against Sauron's army to draw his gaze from Frodo and Sam as they approach Mount Doom with the One Ring.

movies.title: The Lord of the Rings: The Fellowship of the Ring
movies.actors: Elijah Wood, Ian McKellen, Orlando Bloom
movies.plot: A meek Hobbit from the Shire and eight companions set out on a journey to destroy the powerful One Ring and save Middle-earth from the Dark Lord Sauron.

movies.title: Chocolat
movies.actors: Juliette Binoche, Johnny Depp, Judi Dench
movies.plot: A French woman and her young daughter open up a chocolate shop in a small remote village that shakes up the rigid morality of the community.

movies.title: Oldboy
movies.actors: Choi Min-sik, Yoo Ji-tae, Kang Hye-jeong
movies.plot: After being kidnapped and imprisoned for fifteen years, Oh Dae-Su is released, only to find that he must find his captor in five days.

movies.title: I-See-You.com
movies.actors: Beau Bridges, Rosanna Arquette, Mathew Botuchis
movies.plot: When a son installs tiny cameras around the house, he turns his family into an Internet sensation. His folks, and especially his hot 18-year-old sister, are fuming mad--that is, until they see the cash start rolling in.

movies.title: WALL·E
movies.actors: Ben Burtt, Elissa Knight, Jeff Garlin
movies.plot: In the distant future, a small waste-collecting robot inadvertently embarks on a space journey that will ultimately decide the fate of mankind.

movies.title: Hellboy II: The Golden Army
movies.actors: Ron Perlman, Selma Blair, Doug Jones
movies.plot: A prince of the mythical world starts a rebellion against humanity in order to rule the Earth. Hellboy and his team must fight to stop him from locating the all-powerful Golden Army.

movies.title: Casino Royale
movies.actors: Daniel Craig, Eva Green, Judi Dench
movies.plot: After earning 00 status and a licence to kill, secret agent James Bond sets out on his first mission as 007. Bond must defeat a private banker funding terrorists in a high-stakes game of poker at Casino Royale, Montenegro.

movies.title: Sunset Blvd.
movies.actors: William Holden, Gloria Swanson, Erich von Stroheim
movies.plot: A screenwriter develops a dangerous relationship with a faded film star determined to make a triumphant return.

movies.title: The Hitchhiker's Guide to the Galaxy
movies.actors: Martin Freeman, Yasiin Bey, Sam Rockwell
movies.plot: Mere seconds before the Earth is to be demolished by an alien construction crew, journeyman Arthur Dent is swept off the planet by his friend Ford Prefect, a researcher penning a new edition of "The Hitchhiker's Guide to the Galaxy."

movies.title: The Wolf of Wall Street
movies.actors: Leonardo DiCaprio, Jonah Hill, Margot Robbie
movies.plot: Based on the true story of Jordan Belfort, from his rise to a wealthy stock-broker living the high life to his fall involving crime, corruption and the federal government.

movies.title: The Grand Budapest Hotel
movies.actors: Ralph Fiennes, F. Murray Abraham, Mathieu Amalric
movies.plot: A writer encounters the owner of an aging high-class hotel, who tells him of his early years serving as a lobby boy in the hotel's glorious years under an exceptional concierge.

movies.title: Silver Linings Playbook
movies.actors: Bradley Cooper, Jennifer Lawrence, Robert De Niro
movies.plot: After a stint in a mental institution, former teacher Pat Solitano moves back in with his parents and tries to reconcile with his ex-wife. Things get more challenging when Pat meets Tiffany, a mysterious girl with problems of her ...

movies.title: V for Vendetta
movies.actors: Hugo Weaving, Natalie Portman, Rupert Graves
movies.plot: In a future British dystopian society, a shadowy freedom fighter, known only by the alias of "V", plots to overthrow the tyrannical government - with the help of a young woman.

movies.title: Oblivion
movies.actors: Tom Cruise, Morgan Freeman, Andrea Riseborough
movies.plot: A veteran assigned to extract Earth's remaining resources begins to question what he knows about his mission and himself.

movies.title: Once Upon a Time in America
movies.actors: Robert De Niro, James Woods, Elizabeth McGovern
movies.plot: A former Prohibition-era Jewish gangster returns to the Lower East Side of Manhattan 35 years later, where he must once again confront the ghosts and regrets of his old life.

movies.title: Pacific Rim
movies.actors: Idris Elba, Charlie Hunnam, Rinko Kikuchi
movies.plot: As a war between humankind and monstrous sea creatures wages on, a former pilot and a trainee are paired up to drive a seemingly obsolete special weapon in a desperate effort to save the world from the apocalypse.

movies.title: Gandhi
movies.actors: Ben Kingsley, John Gielgud, Rohini Hattangadi
movies.plot: The life of the lawyer who became the famed leader of the Indian revolts against the British rule through his philosophy of nonviolent protest.

movies.title: Gattaca
movies.actors: Ethan Hawke, Uma Thurman, Jude Law
movies.plot: A genetically inferior man assumes the identity of a superior one in order to pursue his lifelong dream of space travel.

movies.title: Kiss Kiss Bang Bang
movies.actors: Robert Downey Jr., Val Kilmer, Michelle Monaghan
movies.plot: After being mistaken for an actor, a New York thief is sent to Hollywood to train under a private eye for a potential movie role, but the duo are thrown together with a struggling actress into a murder mystery.

movies.title: The Impossible
movies.actors: Naomi Watts, Ewan McGregor, Tom Holland
movies.plot: The story of a tourist family in Thailand caught in the destruction and chaotic aftermath of the 2004 Indian Ocean tsunami.

movies.title: Cloud Atlas
movies.director: Tom Tykwer, Lana Wachowski, Lilly Wachowski
movies.actors: Tom Hanks, Halle Berry, Hugh Grant
movies.plot: An exploration of how the actions of individual lives impact one another in the past, present and future, as one soul is shaped from a killer into a hero, and an act of kindness ripples across centuries to inspire a revolution.

movies.title: Dallas Buyers Club
movies.actors: Matthew McConaughey, Jennifer Garner, Jared Leto
movies.plot: In 1985 Dallas, electrician and hustler Ron Woodroof works around the system to help AIDS patients get the medication they need after he is diagnosed with the disease.

movies.title: The Quiet American
movies.actors: Michael Caine, Brendan Fraser, Thi Hai Yen Do
movies.plot: An old British reporter vies with a young U.S. doctor for the affections of a beautiful Vietnamese woman.

movies.title: The English Patient
movies.actors: Ralph Fiennes, Juliette Binoche, Willem Dafoe
movies.plot: At the close of World War II, a young nurse tends to a badly-burned plane crash victim. His past is shown in flashbacks, revealing an involvement in a fateful love affair.

movies.title: Frida
movies.actors: Salma Hayek, Alfred Molina, Geoffrey Rush
movies.plot: A biography of artist Frida Kahlo, who channeled the pain of a crippling injury and her tempestuous marriage into her work.

movies.title: All Quiet on the Western Front
movies.actors: Lew Ayres, Louis Wolheim, John Wray
movies.plot: A German youth eagerly enters World War I, but his enthusiasm wanes as he gets a firsthand view of the horror.

movies.title: The Last Samurai
movies.actors: Tom Cruise, Ken Watanabe, Billy Connolly
movies.plot: An American military advisor embraces the Samurai culture he was hired to destroy after he is captured in battle.

movies.title: Spirited Away
movies.actors: Daveigh Chase, Suzanne Pleshette, Miyu Irino
movies.plot: During her family's move to the suburbs, a sullen 10-year-old girl wanders into a world ruled by gods, witches, and spirits, and where humans are changed into beasts.

movies.title: Before Sunrise
movies.actors: Ethan Hawke, Julie Delpy, Andrea Eckert
movies.plot: A young man and woman meet on a train in Europe, and wind up spending one evening together in Vienna. Unfortunately, both know that this will probably be their only night together.

movies.title: Before Midnight
movies.actors: Ethan Hawke, Julie Delpy, Seamus Davey-Fitzpatrick
movies.plot: We meet Jesse and Celine nine years on in Greece. Almost two decades have passed since their first meeting on that train bound for Vienna.

movies.title: Before Sunset
movies.actors: Ethan Hawke, Julie Delpy, Vernon Dobtcheff
movies.plot: Nine years after Jesse and Celine first met, they encounter each other again on the French leg of Jesse's book tour.

movies.title: Chinatown
movies.actors: Jack Nicholson, Faye Dunaway, John Huston
movies.plot: A private detective hired to expose an adulterer in 1930s Los Angeles finds himself caught up in a web of deceit, corruption, and murder.

movies.title: The Rum Diary
movies.actors: Johnny Depp, Giovanni Ribisi, Aaron Eckhart
movies.plot: American journalist Paul Kemp takes on a freelance job in Puerto Rico for a local newspaper during the 1960s and struggles to find a balance between island culture and the expatriates who live there.

movies.title: Calvary
movies.actors: Brendan Gleeson, Chris O'Dowd, Kelly Reilly
movies.plot: After he is threatened during a confession, a good-natured priest must battle the dark forces closing in around him.

movies.title: Indochine
movies.actors: Catherine Deneuve, Vincent Perez, Linh-Dan Pham
movies.plot: Eliane adopts Camille, whose Vietnamese parents were friends. In 1930, a French navy officer is interested in Eliane (owns 60km2 plantation) and later in Camille. There's an uprising in Vietnam against French colonial power.

movies.title: Interstellar
movies.actors: Matthew McConaughey, Anne Hathaway, Jessica Chastain
movies.plot: A team of explorers travel through a wormhole in space in an attempt to ensure humanity's survival.

movies.title: Boyhood
movies.actors: Ellar Coltrane, Patricia Arquette, Ethan Hawke
movies.plot: The life of Mason, from early childhood to his arrival at college.

movies.title: Birdman or (The Unexpected Virtue of Ignorance)
movies.actors: Michael Keaton, Zach Galifianakis, Edward Norton
movies.plot: A washed-up superhero actor attempts to revive his fading career by writing, directing, and starring in a Broadway production.

movies.title: The Imitation Game
movies.actors: Benedict Cumberbatch, Keira Knightley, Matthew Goode
movies.plot: During World War II, the English mathematical genius Alan Turing tries to crack the German Enigma code with help from fellow mathematicians while attempting to come to terms with his troubled private life.

movies.title: Shogun
movies.actors: Richard Chamberlain, Toshirô Mifune, Yôko Shimada
movies.plot: An English navigator becomes both a player and pawn in the complex political games in feudal Japan.

movies.title: Ex Machina
movies.actors: Alicia Vikander, Domhnall Gleeson, Oscar Isaac
movies.plot: A young programmer is selected to participate in a ground-breaking experiment in synthetic intelligence by evaluating the human qualities of a highly advanced humanoid A.I.

movies.title: Vertigo
movies.actors: James Stewart, Kim Novak, Barbara Bel Geddes
movies.plot: A former San Francisco police detective juggles wrestling with his personal demons and becoming obsessed with the hauntingly beautiful woman he has been hired to trail, who may be deeply disturbed.

movies.title: To Kill a Mockingbird
movies.actors: Gregory Peck, John Megna, Frank Overton
movies.plot: Atticus Finch, a widowed lawyer in Depression-era Alabama, defends a black man against an undeserved rape charge, and his children against prejudice.

movies.title: A Separation
movies.actors: Payman Maadi, Leila Hatami, Sareh Bayat
movies.plot: A married couple are faced with a difficult decision - to improve the life of their child by moving to another country or to stay in Iran and look after a deteriorating parent who has Alzheimer's disease.

movies.title: Spotlight
movies.actors: Mark Ruffalo, Michael Keaton, Rachel McAdams
movies.plot: The true story of how the Boston Globe uncovered the massive scandal of child molestation and cover-up within the local Catholic Archdiocese, shaking the entire Catholic Church to its core.

movies.title: The Big Short
movies.actors: Christian Bale, Steve Carell, Ryan Gosling
movies.plot: In 2006-2007 a group of investors bet against the US mortgage market. In their research, they discover how flawed and corrupt the market is.

movies.title: The Hateful Eight
movies.actors: Samuel L. Jackson, Kurt Russell, Jennifer Jason Leigh
movies.plot: In the dead of a Wyoming winter, a bounty hunter and his prisoner find shelter in a cabin currently inhabited by a collection of nefarious characters.

movies.title: The Martian
movies.actors: Matt Damon, Jessica Chastain, Kristen Wiig
movies.plot: An astronaut becomes stranded on Mars after his team assume him dead, and must rely on his ingenuity to find a way to signal to Earth that he is alive and can survive until a potential rescue.

movies.title: Hotel Rwanda
movies.actors: Don Cheadle, Sophie Okonedo, Joaquin Phoenix
movies.plot: Paul Rusesabagina, a hotel manager, houses over a thousand Tutsi refugees during their struggle against the Hutu militia in Rwanda, Africa.

movies.title: Nebraska
movies.actors: Bruce Dern, Will Forte, June Squibb
movies.plot: An aging, booze-addled father makes the trip from Montana to Nebraska with his estranged son in order to claim a million-dollar Mega Sweepstakes Marketing prize.

movies.title: The Boat
movies.actors: Jürgen Prochnow, Herbert Grönemeyer, Klaus Wennemann
movies.plot: A German U-boat stalks the frigid waters of the North Atlantic as its young crew experience the sheer terror and claustrophobic life of a submariner in World War II.

movies.title: The Lives of Others
movies.actors: Ulrich Mühe, Martina Gedeck, Sebastian Koch
movies.plot: In 1984 East Berlin, an agent of the secret police, conducting surveillance on a writer and his lover, finds himself becoming increasingly absorbed by their lives.

movies.title: 12 Angry Men
movies.actors: Henry Fonda, Lee J. Cobb, Martin Balsam
movies.plot: The jury in a New York City murder trial is frustrated by a single member whose skeptical caution forces them to more carefully consider the evidence before jumping to a hasty verdict.

movies.title: Big Nothing
movies.actors: David Schwimmer, Simon Pegg, Alice Eve
movies.plot: A frustrated, unemployed professor joins forces with a scammer and a friend of his in a blackmailing scheme.

movies.title: Sin City
movies.director: Frank Miller, Quentin Tarantino, Robert Rodriguez
movies.actors: Mickey Rourke, Clive Owen, Bruce Willis
movies.plot: An exploration of the dark and miserable Basin City and three of its residents, all of whom are caught up in violent corruption.

movies.title: Shrek
movies.actors: Mike Myers, Eddie Murphy, Cameron Diaz
movies.plot: A mean lord exiles fairytale creatures to the swamp of a grumpy ogre, who must go on a quest and rescue a princess for the lord in order to get his land back.

movies.title: Shrek 2
movies.director: Andrew Adamson, Kelly Asbury, Conrad Vernon
movies.actors: Mike Myers, Eddie Murphy, Cameron Diaz
movies.plot: Shrek and Fiona travel to the Kingdom of Far Far Away, where Fiona's parents are King and Queen, to celebrate their marriage. When they arrive, they find they are not as welcome as they thought they would be.

movies.title: Shrek Forever After
movies.actors: Mike Myers, Cameron Diaz, Eddie Murphy
movies.plot: Rumpelstiltskin tricks a mid-life crisis burdened Shrek into allowing himself to be erased from existence and cast in a dark alternate timeline where Rumpelstiltskin rules supreme.

movies.title: Mr. & Mrs. Smith
movies.actors: Brad Pitt, Angelina Jolie, Adam Brody
movies.plot: A bored married couple is surprised to learn that they are both assassins hired by competing agencies to kill each other.

movies.title: Original Sin
movies.actors: Antonio Banderas, Angelina Jolie, Thomas Jane
movies.plot: A woman, along with her lover, plans to con a rich man by marrying him, earning his trust, and then running away with all his money. Everything goes as planned until she falls in love with him.
